entry.title: WIND WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:07 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 6:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
